title: Dr. Sivanandam M, KPR Institute Engineering and Technology, Autonomous Engineering Institution, Coimbatore, India
paragraphs: I worked as a Post-Doctoral Fellow in Laboratory of Biological Physics, Institute of Physics, Polish Academy of Sciences, Warsaw, Poland from 3.4.2021 to 2.4.2022.
Guest Lecturer, Department of Physics, Periyar University, Salem, Tamilnadu, India (From 8.8.2019 to 25.3.2021).

I worked as a Research Assistant in the Bioinformatics Centre, Department of Physics, Manonmanium Sundaranar University, Tirunelveli - 627 012, Tamilnadu, India funded by the Department of Biotechnology, New Delhi, Government of India, During April 1st 2013 to November 30th 2013

Received Travel grant to attend the Bioexcel and PRACE joint course on “Hands-on Introduction to HPC for Life Scientists” organized by European Bioinformatics Institute, European Molecular Biology Laboratory, Cambridgeshire, UK

Established the remote login access to use HPC (High Performance Computing) facility available in Centre for Development of Advanced Computing (C-DAC) [Under -Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) and Ministry of Communications and Information Technology] Government of India, Bioinformatics Research and Applications Facility (BRAF), Innovation Park C-DAC, Pune.
Indian Crystallographic Association (ICA), Centre for Development of Advanced Computing (C-DAC), Pune.
